newsitem.title: UK: JBA Holdings buys French firm Presys.
newsitem.headline: JBA Holdings buys French firm Presys.

text.p: British software and business applications firm JBA Holdings said on Wednesday it had acquired French firm Presys Holding SA for 95.5 million francs.
JBA said the consideration would be satisfied by cash of 46.5 million francs and the rest through the issue of 753,403 JBA ordinary shares.
A further consideration of up to two million francs in cash and shares of four million franc of shares may be payable in 18 months.
JBA is currently trading at 800p, 35p up from its Tuesday close.
Presys has 300 employees in 10 offices throughout France, working on 2,000 customers, the majority of whom have yet to move to millenium compliant solutions. --London Newsroom +44 171 542 4366
